Package it.unipr.sowide.actodes.registry

Class TemporaryRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unipr.sowide.actodes.registry.Registry
      • it.unipr.sowide.actodes.registry.TemporaryRegistry
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public final class TemporaryRegistry
extends Registry
    The TemporaryRegistry class defines an implementation of an actors registry for passive actors that removes from its list the idle actors and adds again them when they receive a new message. Idle actors are maintained in the memory. This implementation does not reuses the addresses of the killed actors. Therefore, the registry life is constrained by the number of created actors.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
